document.full_text: andrew lloyd webber said he would donate nearly $52 million to arts organizations in his home country, using money raised from the sale of a picasso painting last year.
document.title: lloyd webber pledges funds from picasso sale to british arts groups
lines_and_colors: andrew lloyd webber said he would donate nearly $52 million to arts organizations in his home country, using money raised from the sale of a picasso painting last year.
